name: JUSTINIANO TAGARDA
title: FULL-STACK .NET DEVELOPER | ASP.NET · SQL Server · Web APIs · React
profile: Software Developer with 15+ years of experience designing, building, and maintaining enterprise-grade web and desktop applications using .NET, ASP.NET, and SQL Server. Strong background in IIS administration, system deployment, and database optimization. Proven track record delivering scalable, reliable business systems and full-stack solutions used in large-scale production environments. Extensive experience working remotely with distributed teams.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained high-availability backend APIs using .NET, supporting production systems with thousands of daily users.
Collaborated with stakeholders to translate business requirements into scalable backend solutions.
Managed SQL Server performance, backups, and troubleshooting.
Developed client-side components using Knockout.js and jQuery.
Administered IIS deployments and server monitoring.
Delivered end-to-end solutions for clients across e-commerce, internal business systems, and custom enterprise tools.
Acted as technical lead, handling architecture, deployment, and post-launch support.
Built the company website and multiple internal web applications, including an ERP and inventory system, to streamline operations and improve workflow efficiency.
Developed a customer portal for real-time project monitoring and delivered web tools for branch office staff.
Managed and supervised the IT department, ensured reliable systems, support, and technology alignment with business needs.
Developed a company-wide inventory system using MS Access to improve tracking, accuracy, and operational efficiency.
Installed and configured LAN infrastructure across offices, factories, and warehouses, ensured stable connectivity and streamlined communication.
